title: DeFi Exchange Token Powering dYdX Soars 9% Overnight

title: BRICS Countries Can Use India’s UPI Instant Payment System, Prime Minister Modi Suggests
description: Member states of the BRICS bloc can follow the example of other nations and start using India’s Unified Payments Interface (UPI) system, according to Prime Minister Narendra Modi. The country is a leader in digital transactions, the head of the Indian government said in South Africa where the organization is holding its annual summit. India […]

title: Ripple vs. SEC trial dates revealed
description: In the ongoing legal battle between Ripple Labs and the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), both parties have reportedly submitted a list of dates indicating their availability and unavailability for the upcoming trial, scheduled for the second quarter of next year. title: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse and Chairman Cannot Attend Court During Bitcoin Halving; Long Delay for XRP Case Expected
description: The letter was submitted to Judge Analisa Torres on August 22 by attorneys representing both Ripple executives charged in the lawsuit.
